Sentencas: The electromotive force (EMF) method is widely applied to measure the ionic transport numbers (ti) of mixed oxygen -ionic and electronic conducting oxides.
Titulo: Multifactor theoretical study on ionic transport numbers of mixed oxygen ionic-electronic conducting oxides determined by the electromotive force method

Sentencas: However, the results determined by the EMF method are the average/apparent ti (tapp i ), subjected to a given gradient of oxygen partial pressure (PO2 ), rather than ti at a specific PO2, making it chal-lenging to reveal the accurate properties of materials.
Titulo: Multifactor theoretical study on ionic transport numbers of mixed oxygen ionic-electronic conducting oxides determined by the electromotive force method

Sentencas: In this study, to clarify the impact of this issue, a precise defect distribution model of Gd doped CeO2 (GDC), considering defect equilibrium and local charge neutrality, is built.
Titulo: Multifactor theoretical study on ionic transport numbers of mixed oxygen ionic-electronic conducting oxides determined by the electromotive force method

Sentencas: A multifactor theoretical analysis is conducted to compare tiapp and ti of the membrane at different sides.
Titulo: Multifactor theoretical study on ionic transport numbers of mixed oxygen ionic-electronic conducting oxides determined by the electromotive force method

Sentencas: The modeling results reveal that a thick membrane is recommended for avoiding the influence of membrane thickness on tapp i .
Titulo: Multifactor theoretical study on ionic transport numbers of mixed oxygen ionic-electronic conducting oxides determined by the electromotive force method

Sentencas: When there is a large difference of PO2 between two sides of the GDC membrane high PO2 P O2 low PO2 PO2 > 1025), tapp i is inclined to ti at the side of high PO2.
Titulo: Multifactor theoretical study on ionic transport numbers of mixed oxygen ionic-electronic conducting oxides determined by the electromotive force method

Sentencas: Only when both sides of the GDC membrane are reducing atmosphere, tiapp of the modified EMF method is approximately the average of ti at both sides.
Titulo: Multifactor theoretical study on ionic transport numbers of mixed oxygen ionic-electronic conducting oxides determined by the electromotive force method

Sentencas: The findings of this study are instructive for the rational application of EMF methods.
Titulo: Multifactor theoretical study on ionic transport numbers of mixed oxygen ionic-electronic conducting oxides determined by the electromotive force method
